imdb.plot outline: English Fun is a lighthearted approach to teaching conversation English and lets viewers see that making mistakes is part of the journey. The daily program is designed for a Myanmar audience and uses both languages for a better understanding. Myanmar learners, regardless of age, have different levels of English - so subtitles, fast speaking, slow speaking and with Myanmar and native speakers (as presenters) gives a greater appeal. Most action takes place in the studio and where possible on-location. Commercial sponsorship for educational programs is difficult to find so the team's passion in creating this program on a shoestring is paramount to its success.
imdb.title: English Fun
plot: _English Fun_ (qv) is a lighthearted approach to teaching conversation English and lets viewers see that making mistakes is part of the journey. The daily program is designed for a Myanmar audience and uses both languages for a better understanding. Myanmar learners, regardless of age, have different levels of English - so subtitles, fast speaking, slow speaking and with Myanmar and native speakers (as presenters) gives a greater appeal. Most action takes place in the studio and where possible on-location. Commercial sponsorship for educational programs is difficult to find so the team's passion in creating this program on a shoestring is paramount to its success.::Patrick McGeown
